sentence: The  Israeli  military  said  dozens  of  Hamas  fighters  were  killed,  along  with  a  senior  Hamas  commander.
Palestinians  say  the  strike  killed  scores  of  people  and  Israel  says  Hamas  was  operating  there.

So  far  24  Israeli  soldiers  have  been  killed  in  the  fighting  in  Gaza  since  the  ground  invasion  began  last  week,  according  to  Israeli  officials,  while  Hamas  has  not  released  full  casualty  numbers  for  its  fighters.
